scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && patch-package && NODE_ENV=production strapi build
scripts.deploy:front: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:back: gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$npm_package_project_id/$npm_package_name --project $npm_package_project_id && gcloud run deploy $npm_package_name --quiet --image gcr.io/$npm_package_project_id/$npm_package_name --project $npm_package_project_id --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
